chunks.text:
Sample Document

This is a sample DOCX document generated using python-docx.

Section 1: Introduction

This section provides an overview of the sample content. The purpose of this document is to demonstrate how a Word file can be programmatically generated.

Section 2: Main Content

Here is the main content. You can include lists, tables, and other rich text features.

Key Features:

• Easy generation of DOCX files

• Custom headings and styles

• Can include tables and images
